name: Sausage Rolls
author: Cindy Whaling
summary: Swirls of sausage and mustard in pie dough makes a perfect, attractive and delicious offering at parties. The sausage and mustard are rolled up in the dough, sliced like a jelly roll and baked.
ingredients: 2 (9 inch)  frozen pie crusts, thawed and ready to bake
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Place pie crust dough onto a flat surface
Spread 1/2 pound of sausage onto each pie crust
Flatten the sausage down with a spatula
Roll the pie crust mixture up like a jelly roll
Slice the roll into 1/2-inch circular pieces
Bake for 18 minutes or until sausage is cooked
